Contents.Content: SELECT PatientCode ,PatientName ,PatientSex ,PatientBirthday ,PatientAge ,PatientAddress ,HighRiskInfectivity FROM openquery(ORCLDB, 'SELECT * FROM SUNSOFT.v_Pats_master_index WHERE PatientCode=''{0}''')
